long_description: Anthropogenic aerosols (a mixture of aerosols, not explicitly defined here)
name: AA

long_description: Anthropogenic forcing (a mixture, not explicitly defined here, that might include, for example, well-mixed greenhouse gases, aerosols, ozone, and land-use changes)
name: Ant

long_description: Well-mixed greenhouse gases (a mixture, not explicitly defined here)
name: GHG

long_description: Natural forcing (a combination, not explicitly defined here, that might include, for example, solar and volcanic)
name: Nat

description: Anthropogenic sulfate aerosol direct & indirect effects
long_description: Anthropogenic sulfate aerosol direct & indirect effects
name: SA(=SD+SI)

description: Anthropogenic sulfate aerosol, accounting only for direct effects
long_description: Anthropogenic sulfate aerosol, accounting only for direct effects
name: SD

description: Anthropogenic sulfate aerosol, accounting only for indirect effects
long_description: Anthropogenic sulfate aerosol, accounting only for indirect effects
name: SI

long_description: Solar irradiance (note : Sl is 'S' followed by a lower case 'L', not an upper case 'I')
name: Sl

long_description: Volcanic aerosol (note : Vl is 'V' followed by a lower case 'L', not an upper case 'I')
name: Vl
